mod.name: === Forge ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: The backbone of modded Minecraft.

mod.name: === Core ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: An API for modifying the food and hunger mechanics of Minecraft

mod.name: Auto Ore Dictionary Converter
mod.description: Converts specified ore dictionary items automatically or on keybinding.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: BetterBedrockGen
mod.description: Bedrock Is Flat

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Unlimited Fluid Transport

mod.name: Better Achievements
mod.description: An improvement to the Achievementscreen

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds over 75 new biomes, blocks, and more!

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft.

mod.name: Chameleon
mod.description: Shared code and render support for mods. Used by jaquadro's mods.

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: Extra Bit Manipulation
mod.description: This mod is an addon to the Chisels & Bits mod. It adds a wrench that rotates/mirrors/translates/inverts chiseled blocks, and sculpting wires/spades that remove/add cuboidal/ellipsoidal/cylindrical/conic/pyramidal areas of bits from chiseled/chiselable blocks.

mod.name: Clay WorldGen
mod.description: Adds clay to the natural world gen

mod.name: CompactStorage
mod.description: Adding new storage solutions to your world!

mod.name: Cooking for Blockheads
mod.description: Adds a cooking book and multiblock kitchens that only shows recipes you can make with what you currently have in your inventory.

mod.name: Craft Tweaker
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: CustomThings
mod.description: Adding custom items and blocks via JSON files.

mod.name: CXLibrary
mod.description: Shared code for my mods.

mod.name: Cyclops Core
mod.description: Coremod for EvilCraft, Integrated Dynamics and others.

mod.name: Dark Utilities
mod.description: A mod that adds a bunch of new utilities to the game.

mod.name: DeepResonance
mod.description: Power generation based on resonanting crystals

mod.name: ElecCore | Rendering Library
mod.description: Shared code for Forge mods

mod.name: Enchiridion
mod.description: Books mod for minecraft

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: More Mobs

mod.name: EnderTanks
mod.description: Store liquids inside a subspace pocket located in the End.

mod.name: Extra Utilities 2
mod.description: A bunch of useful things.

mod.name: Fancy Fluid Storage
mod.description: A simple fluid storage mod that's gonna fancy up your world!

mod.name: Fast Leaf Decay
mod.description: Increases leaf decay rates.

mod.name: Fluxed Redstone
mod.description: RF and Tesla Mulitpart cables!

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Furnus
mod.description: A configurable furnace

mod.name: Gear Swapper
mod.description: Handy block to swap your gear

mod.name: Harvest
mod.description: Right click crop harvesting

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: Integrated Dynamics
mod.description: Take full and automated control of your appliances.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: Block Drops
mod.description: Block Drops (JEI Addon)

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: xLib
mod.description: Required library for TheXFactor117's mods.

mod.name: Levels
mod.description: A new, innovative leveling mod, focused around leveling up weapons to gain unique boosts.

mod.name: LunatriusCore
mod.description: A collection of utilities for Lunatrius' mods.

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: MCMultiPart
mod.description: MCMultiPart is a community effort to make a multipart API that's both easy to use and very powerful.

mod.name: MattDahEpic Core
mod.description: Base Mod for all MattDahEpic mods.

mod.name: MmmMmmMmmMmm
mod.description: Provides a test dummy that can be placed in the world. Punch it, kick it, slice it, push it, pop it, twist it,....

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool
mod.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mod.name: ModPack Utilities
mod.description: will add various tools for modpack developers

mod.name: ModPack Basic Tools
mod.description: Adds Change logs, info, and bug reporting tab.

mod.name: Multi-Storage
mod.description: Vaults, Hidden Chests, and Stacking Chests

mod.name: NetherPortalFix
mod.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mod.name: NoMoreRecipeConflict
mod.description: Switch between conflicting recipes

mod.name: NotEnoughCodecs
mod.description: Streaming codecs for various formats

mod.name: Not Enough Wands
mod.description: Wands, wands, and more wands

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: Ore Tweaker
mod.description: Allows you to tweak vanilla ore generation

mod.name: Packing Tape
mod.description: Adds a simple means to carry thigns with you

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: Expanding minecraft's food system.

mod.name: Pong
mod.description: Pong shows the actual ping in the player list

mod.name: Progressive Automation
mod.description: A mod that adds automation that can be built in the early game and upgraded throughout late game.

mod.name: Psi
mod.description: Psionic SpellCasting Instruments

mod.name: QuantumFlux
mod.description: Wireless Redstone Flux

mod.name: Quark
mod.description: Small things.

mod.name: Random Utilities
mod.description: Adds miscellaneous useful items.

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: RebornCore
mod.description: RebornCore, A core set of classes.

mod.name: TechReborn
mod.description: TechReborn, The Gregtech revival you dream about on a cool mid summer's eve.

mod.name: Refined Storage
mod.description: A Minecraft mod all about storage.

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: RFTools Dimensions
mod.description: RFTools Dimensions Addon

mod.name: Roguelike Dungeons
mod.description: Adds randomized dungeons to the world

mod.name: Roots
mod.description: Druidic Magic Mod

mod.name: Realistic Terrain Generation
mod.description: Adds a new world type which generates realistic terrain for Overworld biomes.

mod.name: SensorCraft
mod.description: Modular mobile and non-mobile sensors

mod.name: ShadowMC
mod.description: A library mod required for all my other mods.

mod.name: ShetiPhian-Core
mod.description: Core set of files needed by ShetiPhians mods

mod.name: Signals
mod.description: This mod adds Signals to the game, which behave similar to OpenTTD signaling (which is based on how train signals in real life behave).

mod.name: Simply Conveyors
mod.description: Simply Conveyors is a mod in which you use conveyors to both move items around, and use them as player transport. It has multiple types of conveyors to fit your needs.

mod.name: Sleeping Bag
mod.description: A sleeping bag

mod.name: Stackie
mod.description: Stack entities into groups to decrease lag.

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Substratum
mod.description: Base resources and crafting materials.

mod.name: The One Probe
mod.description: A Probe to rule them all!

mod.name: ThutCore
mod.description: API used by Thut's Mods

mod.name: Thut's Elevators
mod.description: Adds elevators to minecraft

mod.name: TIS-3D
mod.description: TIS-100 inspired low-tech computing for Minecraft.

mod.name: Totemic
mod.description: Totem Poles? Totem Poles!

mod.name: TrashSlot
mod.description: Adds a trash slot to the inventory screen that allows deletion of unwanted items.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: Waila (What Am I Looking At) is a UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly ingame.

mod.name: WAILA-features
mod.description: Adds some extra features to WAILA

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: What Are We Looking At
mod.description: Greatly expands upon the amount of information provided by the Waila HUD, along with bridging support between Waila and many other minecraft mods!

mod.name: Woot
mod.description: The alternative mob spawner/grinder system

mod.name: === Client Mod ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: === Server Mod ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: AmbientSounds
mod.description: Bringing the Audio of Nature to Minecraft!

mod.name: BetterMinecraftChat
mod.description: Emoticons, Image Preview, Tabs and Filters. Client-side only.

mod.name: Chunk Animator
mod.description: A small client side mod that animates the appeareance of chunks so that they don't just instantly appear

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: Custom Main Menu Files
mod.description: Files and images for CMM

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: ItemPhysic
mod.description: Bringing realistic physics to your Minecraft items.

mod.name: Item Scroller
mod.description: Move items in inventory GUIs by scrolling the mouse wheel over slots with items in them

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. JourneyMap API: v1.9.4-1.2. Built: 2016-06-10-14:58:16.

mod.name: MapWriter
mod.description: An open source mini map mod

mod.name: MineMenu
mod.description: MineMenu supports key bindings, commands, and creative functions to make your life easier.

mod.name: MoreOverlays
mod.description: Adds some overlays from NEI (Mob spawns, Chunk Bounds, Item Search)

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.name: Neat
mod.description: Minimalistic Functional Unit Plates for the modern Minecrafter

mod.name: Potion Icon Remover
mod.description: Removes the Potion Icons in game.

mod.name: TrueType Font Replacement
mod.description: Adds TrueType/OpenType font support

mod.name: Vein Miner
mod.description: When a configured block is harvested a chain reaction is initiated to break connected blocks of the same type. Takes durability and health for each block mined.

mod.name: === Dev Only ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: Loading Profiler
mod.description: Shows how long mods take for FML Loading Events

mod.name: Torcherino
mod.description: Simple mod that adds OP torches.

mod.name: WorldEdit
mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.
